timeline.bodyText: Not related to this PR, but could it be made more deterministic by having a CountDownLatch, call await here and CountDownLatch#countDown in a first step of the pipeline (peek/map)?
timeline.author: frant-hartm

replies.bodyText: In this test I'm trying to see what happens if the connection to the DB drops while snapshotting is going on. Snapshotting is a process with 9 stages. I'm interested to see what happens in all the stages, on connection drop. If I would make the test more deterministic (for example the way you suggest), then it would probably always trigger around the same stage, towards the end or after snapshotting. I don't want that. With such a random sleep there will eventually always be runs for all possible scenarios. Yes, it's not deterministic, will be hard to debug, but if there is a problem we will likely find out about it. Eventually. This was my thinking.
replies.author: jbartok
